Package Part_B

Class Ex3B

  • java.lang.Object
    • Part_B.Ex3B
  • public class Ex3B
extends java.lang.Object
    This class compares three running times of functions that perform the same operations in different ways.
    Author:
    Lior Habani & Ilan Kitzio

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void countLinesOneProcess​(int numFiles)
      This function creates files with a number of random lines and checks the total number of rows by one process.
      static void countLinesThreadPool​(int num)
      This function creates files with a number of random lines and checks the total number of rows by pool thread for all the files.
      static void countLinesThreads​(int numFiles)
      This function creates files with a number of random lines and checks the total number of rows by thread for each file.
      static java.lang.String[] createFiles​(int n)
      This function creates text files and writes a few random lines, then returns array with the names of the files.
      static void deleteFiles​(java.lang.String[] fileNames)
      This function gets an array with file names and then deletes all of them.
      static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)

        public static java.lang.String[] createFiles​(int n)
        This function creates text files and writes a few random lines, then returns array with the names of the files.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        array with the names of the files.

      • deleteFiles

        public static void deleteFiles​(java.lang.String[] fileNames)
        This function gets an array with file names and then deletes all of them.
        Parameters:
        fileNames - array with the names of the files.

      • countLinesThreads

        public static void countLinesThreads​(int numFiles)
        This function creates files with a number of random lines and checks the total number of rows by thread for each file.
        Parameters:
        numFiles - the number of files.

      • countLinesThreadPool

        public static void countLinesThreadPool​(int num)
        This function creates files with a number of random lines and checks the total number of rows by pool thread for all the files.
        Parameters:
        num - the number of files.
